com.github.andreptb.fitnesse.util

Class FitnesseMarkup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.andreptb.fitnesse.util.FitnesseMarkup

  • public class FitnesseMarkup
extends Object
    General utilities to process FitNesse markup syntax so can be used by Selenium Fixture

    • Method Detail

      • compare

        public boolean compare(Object expected,
              Object obtained)
        Compares two values emulating FitNesse comparisons:

        http://fitnesse.org/FitNesse.FullReferenceGuide.UserGuide.WritingAcceptanceTests.SliM.ValueComparisons

        For now supports only exact equal and regular expression comparisons
        Parameters:
        expected - value
        obtained - value
        Returns:
        comparisonResult

      • clean

        public String clean(Object symbol)
        Cleans FitNesse markup from symbols such as:
        • Extracts a keyboard special key value from special key markup. See #
        • Extracts URL only from HTML generated links
        • Extracts text from HTML wiki page creation suggestion link
        • Strips undefined variable ocurrences on text
        Parameters:
        symbol - to be cleaned
        Returns:
        cleanedSymbol

      • imgLink

        public String imgLink(Object img)
        Creates img markup to be viewed in test page. Usually used by fixtures that wants to return a image link for the test result.s
        Parameters:
        img - File containing the image
        Returns:
        Image link

      • registerKeyboardSpecialKey

        public void registerKeyboardSpecialKey(String keyName,
                              String keyValue)
        Registers a system property (System.setProperty(String, String)) allowing user to develop tests referencing special keys such as tab and enter by using variables. For example:

        If keyName="tab" and keyValue="" then ${KEY_TAB} will resolve to "<span keycode="">tab</span>"

        Parameters:
        keyName - Special keyboard key name
        keyValue - Special keyboard key value
